Sentencas: A technical description and experimental analysis of a SOFC demonstration unit is presented.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: The unit contains most of the primary BoP-components of a complete SOFC system, except of air and fuel recirculation equipment or fuel system compressor.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: Natural gas is used as the fuel and electricity is supplied to the electric grid.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: A 5 kW power class planar SOFC stack from Research Centre Julich is assembled to the demo unit and a long-term experiment is conducted to assess the characteristic performance and durability of different components of the unit (e.g. the SOFC stack, the fuel pre-reformer and air heat exchangers).
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: The evolution of absolute voltage drop of the stack over time is found to be of the same magnitude when compared to short stack experiments.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: Thus, other system components are not observed to cause an increase in the characteristic voltage drop of the stack.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: Two BoP-components, the afterburner and the power conversion unit failed to operate as designed.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit

Sentencas: The performance of other BoP-components i.e. fuel pre-reformer and heat exchangers were satisfactory during the test run, and no significant performance loss could be measured.
Titulo: Experimental Analysis on Performance and Durability of SOFC Demonstration Unit
